item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0708; 11:57AM; 7559 N Whitsett Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IqL47r; #SunValley; Address Corrected from Saticoy Street . The first arriving 30 LAFD Firefighters took just 18 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire within one first floor apartment in the 4,936 square-foot 8 unit garden-style apartment building. Firefighter efforts to search the premises and fully extinguish the fire was hampered by excessive personal storage inside the apartment. No injuries have been reported. The building, constructed in 1958, was not equipped with optional residential fire sprinklers. LAPD Foothill Division (Incident #1907) has taken one person into custody at the scene for yet unconfirmed circumstances. LAFD Investigators are assigned. The cause of the fire remains under active investigation.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; AR1 BC10 BC12 BC14 CM22 CM42 E102 E239 E260 E278 E61 E81 E89 EM14 RA86 RA889 RA89 RA97 T39 T60 T78; CH8; 17 18; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0708; 11:39AM; 12500 W Saticoy St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IqGohK; #SunValley; PRELIM: 2 story garden-style apartment building with one unit on the first floor well involved with fire. A search of the premises is being hampered by excessive personal storage inside the apartment. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 E102 E260 E278 E81 E89 RA86 RA889 T60 T78; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision; INC#1413; 07:32PM; 4501 W Coliseum St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CVl0Qu; #BaldwinHills / #Crenshaw; PRELIM: Solo vehicle into laundromat (no details). No injuries reported. LA Department of Building & Safety Inspector en route to assess structural integrity. Media Inquiries: LAPD South Traffic Division (Incident #3656); FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; E94 RA826; CH4; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Grass Fire; INC#1364; 07:30PM; 5600 N Fulton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3L3hfez; #ValleyGlen; Despite wind gusts nearing 20 mph, 39 LAFD Firefighters took just 41 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish multiple areas of burning vegetation and debris near the Metro 'G' (Orange) Line Busway. No injury. Minor fence damage. No homes damaged. #LATraffic: The Metro G Line will remain closed in the immediate area of the fire until LAFD overhaul operations are complete, unknown duration. Transit Users: Follow @MetroLAAlerts https://twitter.com/MetroLAAlerts on Twitter for any G Line service related information.; FS 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E109 E239 E288 E39 E60 E88 T39 T88 WT88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Rubbish Fire; INC#1364; 06:49PM; 5600 N Fulton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3L3hfez; #ValleyGlen; PRELIM: Multiple areas of vegetation and debris burning near the Metro 'G' (Orange) Line Busway being fanned by 20 mph winds from the north. No imminent structure threat. #LATraffic: Firefighters are closing the Metro G Line in the area of the fire until LAFD operations are complete, unknown duration. Transit Users: Follow @MetroLAAlerts https://twitter.com/MetroLAAlerts on Twitter for any G Line service related information.; FS 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E109 E239 E39 E60 E88 T39; CH8; Brian Humphrey

Update Traffic Collision; INC#1170; 05:08PM; 18300 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IkMU9T; #Reseda; Additional persons have come forward at the scene, and there are now a total of 6 patients: 3 critical condition, 2 fair condition, 1 minor injury (likely to decline transport). LADWP en route (unknown ETA) to manage toppled utility/light pole. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #2887); FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E100 E103 E273 E290 E73 EM14 EM17 HR3 RA100 RA104 RA107 RA70 RA90 T90 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Unknown age / gender / affiliation / circumstances. No entrapment. KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1750; 11:44PM; 5510 E York Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Io0Sb2; Highland Park; KNOCKDOWN: Updated to a large shed that was exposing several other structures. 40 firefighters extinguished the fire in 21 minutes with no injuries reported.
